title: Error 404 english
description: The meta description is a 160-character summary that will appear in the Google search result bar, following the title of your page. It must be interesting enough to “invite” your audience to click on your website.
keywords: Meta keywords (or keywords) are words or expressions through which our potential audience can find the information on our website. They are essential for the indexing and positioning of our website. Too many keywords can be detected as spam and will penalize your website.
